kubejs.ponder.via_romana_intro.text_1: Via Romana requires infrastructure for fast travel
kubejs.ponder.via_romana_intro.text_2: Unlike other fast travel mods, you must build roads and paths
kubejs.ponder.via_romana_path_building.t: Start by placing path blocks to create your road network
Path blocks form the foundation of your travel network
kubejs.ponder.via_romana_charting.text_1: Right-click with the Charting Map to start charting a path
kubejs.ponder.via_romana_charting.text_2: You must traverse and stay on infrastructure blocks throughout your journey
kubejs.ponder.via_romana_charting.text_3: Right-click again at your destination to complete the path
kubejs.ponder.via_romana_signs.text_1: Place signs near your paths to create waypoint markers
kubejs.ponder.via_romana_signs.text_2: You must register each waypoint by right-clicking the sign
kubejs.ponder.via_romana_signs.text_3: Waypoints are personal - other players must also traverse and register them
kubejs.ponder.via_romana_arrival.text_1: Once you have charted paths and registered waypoints
kubejs.ponder.via_romana_arrival.text_2: You can use them for faster travel along your infrastructure network
kubejs.ponder.via_romana_arrival.text_3: Left-click on a waypoint sign to open the fast travel menu
kubejs.ponder.via_romana_arrival.text_4: This balanced system encourages exploration and infrastructure building
